name: kitt
author: TAKAHASHI Kazunari <takahashi@1syo.net>
description: A simple helpful robot for your Company

scripts.start: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=http://$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS/ REDIS_URL=redis://:$REDISCLOUD_PASSWORD@$REDISCLOUD_HOST:$REDISCLOUD_PORT TZ=Asia/Tokyo bin/hubot -n kitt -a idobata
